Ancelotti expressed anger when Rodrygo missed the penalty in the match against Celtra Vigo, raising the question of the young Brazilian star competing for the penalty kick?

Football Emily · 26/08/2023 · Real Madrid

﻿Simply put, you must score in order to deprive the designated spot-kick taker of a penalty. Rodrygo missed during Real Madrid's 1-0 victory over Celta Vigo, which was unfortunate for him.

In fact, the Brazilian won the penalty kick after outrunning Celta Vigo goalkeeper Ivan Villar, who was only able to bring down the advancing forward. The Spanish goalkeeper, though, would end up having the last laugh as he sprung to his right side to make an outstanding save from the ensuing penalty.
